title: Does Queen still write new songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Queen stopped recording new material after Freddie Mercury died. In 1995, four years after Mercury’s death the band released its “Made in Heaven” album. That album consisted of previously unreleased studio recordings by Mercury that the band produced into final songs, and was the last Queen album. Individual members of Queen have written new material, but not under the “Queen” name.

No. 4 years after Freddie died (1995), Brian, Roger and John released an album with Freddie’s last songs and a song Brian wrote in his memory called “No One But You”. They did not write any new songs since. Brian released a song called “New Horizons” on January 1st of this year, but it is not a Queen song.
